description:
View important configuration properties about your vSphere resources, such as VM network information, host connection state, and cluster DRS status.

To utilize this dashboard, enable the parameter `collect_property_metrics` in your datadog vSphere [configuration](https://github.com/DataDog/integrations-core/blob/7.48.x/vsphere/datadog_checks/vsphere/data/conf.yaml.example#L291).
title: VMware vSphere - Property Metrics

definition.title: VMware Tools Running Status by VM
VMware Tools Version Status by VM
